About Me

Hello! I'm the creator of Tree13, a minimalist blog focused on sharing thoughts about technology, design, and life.

About This Blog

Tree13 is built with Eleventy and Tailwind CSS. It's designed to be simple, fast, and focused on content.

The blog is named "Tree13" as a blend of nature and technology - representing growth and the digital world.

Tech Stack

  • Eleventy - A simple and flexible static site generator
  • Tailwind CSS - A utility-first CSS framework
  • Markdown - For writing content in a simple, readable format

Contact

Feel free to reach out via email or follow me on social media.
